Name: essence_base
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Take [sword]4 damage for each Base Essence.

Name: essence_fire
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [fire]1 burn for each Flame Essence.

Name: essence_ice
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [ice]1 freeze for each Frost Essence.

Name: essence_shock
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [shock]1 shock for each Air Essence.

Name: essence_weaken
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [weaken]1 weaken for each Earth Essence.

Name: essence_poison
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [poison]2 poison for each Toxic Essence.

Name: essence_dark
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive a bad status ([curse]Curse[;] [lock]Lock[;] [shock]Stun)

Name: mf_stun
Description: Random equipment is disabled for the turn.

Name: alternate_mf_stun
Description: Lose a dice next turn.

Name: nothing
Description: Does absolutely nothing.

Name: alternate_nothing
Description: Does absolutely nothing[;] but with a question mark.

Name: grace
Description: At the start of your turn[;] if your health is less than|your Grace ([heart]<value>[])[;] swap your health and your Grace.

Name: healaftercombat
Description: After combat[;] recover [heal]<value> health.|Doesn't trigger if you flee.

Name: poisonovertime
Description: At the end of your turn[;] receive [poison]1 poison.|Lasts for <value> turns.

Name: revolver
Description: After this reaches 6[;] reduce this by 6|and deal [sword]18 damage.

Description: Restore [heal]1 health every 2 seconds[;] for <value> seconds.
